title: Innovative Funding for Open Source Projects: Exploring the Open Compensation Token License Model
description: Discover how the Open Compensation Token License (OCTL) revolutionizes open source funding. Learn about grants, sponsorships, crowdfunding, and more with actionable insights from OCTL's whitepaper.
keywords: Open Source Funding, OCTL, Open Compensation Token License, grants, sponsorships, crowdfunding, open source software
